casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

November 18, 2010

[Cite as 11/18/2010 Case Announcements, 2010-Ohio-5565.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2010-1721. Third Fed. Sav. Bank v. Cox.

Cuyahoga App. No. 93950, 2010-Ohio-4133. This cause is pending before the court as a discretionary appeal. Upon consideration of appellant’s motion for immediate stay of the court of appeals’ judgment and trial court hearing on remand,

It is ordered by the court that the motion is denied.
